CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."PRJ_BLB_RESOURCE_TOTAL_ALLOC_CHECK_SP" AS BEGIN LOOP UPDATE PRJ_RESOURCES SET ODF_SS_TOTAL_ALLOC_CURVE = 1, ODF_SS_TOTAL_HARD_ALC_CURVE = 1 WHERE PRID IN (SELECT P.PRID FROM PRJ_RESOURCES p, PRTEAM t WHERE t.prresourceid = p.prid and t.slice_status = 1 and p.odf_ss_total_alloc_curve is null) AND ROWNUM <= 10000;
EXIT WHEN SQL%ROWCOUNT = 0; COMMIT; END LOOP; END;
